Summary: Bright light in the sky, emanating an intense cone shaped light and trailing smoke or fog
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my yard with friends and looked up at the clear night sky. There were no clouds. I saw something and mentioned it. We all looked up. Before us was an unexplainable sight. There was an intense bright light high in the sky. It was very high and very bright. Beneath this light was a cone shape of light, as if it was a flashlight pointing from space. There was a fog or a smoke being illuminated by this light. The bright light disappeared. Then the smoke slowly dissipated, leaving no trace. Within 30 seconds all that was left was the clear night sky.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around September 19th 2009
